input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Poverty has a direct effect on water quality and cholera. Water company has a direct effect on water quality. Water quality has a direct effect on cholera. Poverty is unobserved. The overall probability of clean water is 22%. The probability of polluted water and cholera contraction is 53%. The probability of clean water and cholera contraction is 20%. Is the chance of cholera contraction smaller when observing clean water?
